DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effects Aromatase Inhibition Obese Men
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study establish short-term efficacy safety aromatase inhibition restore maintain eugonadism hypogonadotrophic hypogonadal men . Secondary aim detect short-term somatic psychological effect . Study design : Double blind randomized placebo-controlled trial . Treatment : 26 week either letrozole placebo . All patient start 1 tablet per week , dose adjustment perform serum testosterone estradiol outside target range . All men prescribe mildly hypocaloric diet . Endpoints : BMI , body weight , waist circumference , body composition , exercise capacity , serum level several hormone marker , glucose tolerance , psychological characteristic . All patient measure 6 time study .
